rules_text:
When Recruitment Forum enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Gnome creature token.
Boon {2} [i](Transform this permanent and attach it to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.)[/i]
flavor_text2:
[i]“Welcome to the Garos militia, recruits! To the left, grab your axes. To the right, your company flagons. Hooah!”
—Galwin, Garos chieftain[/i]
